name: Danmaku Dragon
description:
CONTROLS: 

Z: Attack (parry bullets when attacking bullets while holding down shift)
X: Bomb (when meter is full and the player character starts emitting an effect, fill meter by comboing)
SHIFT: Focus movement (move slowly, see your own hitbox, become able to parry bullets)

The idea behind the gameplay is to try and keep a good combo string going in order to fill your special bar. The most reliable way of doing so is by picking enemies off one by one, and then parrying bullets into the next enemy you're about to attack so that the combo string keeps going while you make your way over there.

Seija has taken over the SDM by reversing everyone's magic, rendering them unable to use it. Show her the power of Chinese martial arts and fists, and become the ULTIMATE gatekeeper.

By: Cathulhu Studios, TankTheta. Special thanks to Potat and Bender
